messages.content: ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO is a better version of the BiRefNet implementation in ComfyUI that supports both image and video background removal.
How is ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO different from the original ComfyUI-BiRefNet plugin?
Compared to the original plugin, ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO separates model loading and image processing to improve speed, can output transparent background PNG images directly, and can process videos.
BiRefNet is currently the best open-source commercially available background removal model.
What are the installation requirements for ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO?
To install ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO, you need the timm dependency. If it is already installed, you only need to git the project.
How can you install ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO manually?

To install ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO manually, you need to: 1. Change directory to custom_nodes, 2. Git clone the project, 3. Change directory to the cloned project, 4. Install the requirements, and 5. Restart ComfyUI.
What models need to be downloaded to use ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO?
To use ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO, you need to download the 6 models from BiRefNet and place them in the ./models/BiRefNet directory.
What nodes are available in ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO?
ComfyUI-BiRefNet-ZHO provides two nodes: ðŸ§¹BiRefNet Model Loader for automatically loading the BiRefNet model and ðŸ§¹BiRefNet for removing backgrounds.
